if.test: reg_date_start != null and reg_date_start != '' and reg_date_end != null and reg_date_end != ''

sql.if: and MG.reg_date::timestamp between concat(#{reg_date_start},' 00:00:00')::timestamp and concat(#{reg_date_end},' 23:59:59')::timestamp

mapper.select: SELECT tad.sens_no, tad.meas_dt, tsi.sens_nm, tdi.district_nm, tad.sens_chnl_id, tad.alarm_lvl_cd, tad.formul_data, tad.net_err_yn, tad.maint_sts_cd, tai."1st_lvl_max" AS max1, tai."1st_lvl_min" AS min1, tai."2nd_lvl_max" AS max2, tai."2nd_lvl_min" AS min2, tai."3rd_lvl_max" AS max3, tai."3rd_lvl_min" AS min3, tai."4th_lvl_max" AS max4, tai."4th_lvl_min" AS min4, tad.reg_dt, tst.sens_tp_nm FROM tb_alarm_details tad LEFT JOIN tb_district_info tdi ON tad.district_no = tdi.district_no LEFT JOIN tb_sensor_info tsi ON tad.sens_no = tsi.sens_no and tsi.alarm_use_yn ='Y' LEFT JOIN tb_alarm_info tai ON tad.sens_no = tai.sens_no and tad.sens_chnl_id = tai.sens_chnl_id LEFT JOIN tb_sensor_type tst ON tsi.senstype_no = tst.senstype_no WHERE 1=1 order by tad.reg_dt desc limit 4

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN alarm_level = 'ARM001' THEN 1 END) AS interest_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN alarm_level = 'ARM002' THEN 1 END) AS notice_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN alarm_level = 'ARM003' THEN 1 END) AS warning_cnt, COUNT(CASE WHEN alarm_level = 'ARM004' THEN 1 END) AS danger_cnt FROM ( SELECT tmd.*, CASE WHEN ( (tai."4th_lvl_min" IS NOT NULL AND (tmd.formul_data - tsi.formul_data) <= tai."4th_lvl_min") OR (tai."4th_lvl_max" IS NOT NULL AND (tmd.formul_data - tsi.formul_data) >= tai."4th_lvl_max") ) THEN 'ARM004' WHEN ( (tai."3rd_lvl_min" IS NOT NULL AND (tmd.formul_data - tsi.formul_data) <= tai."3rd_lvl_min") OR (tai."3rd_lvl_max" IS NOT NULL AND (tmd.formul_data - tsi.formul_data) >= tai."3rd_lvl_max") ) THEN 'ARM003' WHEN ( (tai."2nd_lvl_min" IS NOT NULL AND (tmd.formul_data - tsi.formul_data) <= tai."2nd_lvl_min") OR (tai."2nd_lvl_max" IS NOT NULL AND (tmd.formul_data - tsi.formul_data) >= tai."2nd_lvl_max") ) THEN 'ARM002' WHEN ( (tai."1st_lvl_min" IS NOT NULL AND (tmd.formul_data - tsi.formul_data) <= tai."1st_lvl_min") OR (tai."1st_lvl_max" IS NOT NULL AND (tmd.formul_data - tsi.formul_data) >= tai."1st_lvl_max") ) THEN 'ARM001' ELSE 'ARM009' END AS alarm_level, tai.district_no FROM tb_measure_details tmd JOIN tb_alarm_info tai ON tmd.sens_no = tai.sens_no AND tmd.sens_chnl_id = tai.sens_chnl_id JOIN tb_sensor_init tsi ON tsi.sens_no = tmd.sens_no AND tsi.sens_chnl_id = tmd.sens_chnl_id LEFT JOIN tb_sensor_info tsi2 ON tai.sens_no = tsi2.sens_no and tsi2.alarm_use_yn ='Y' WHERE tmd.reg_dt > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 minute' ) AS MG WHERE 1=1

SELECT MG.* FROM ( SELECT A.alarm_uid , asset.zone_id , A.asset_id , A.asset_kind_id , A.alarm_kind_id , TO_CHAR(A.reg_date::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_date , A.description , ak.risk_level , (SELECT NAME FROM tb_asset_kind WHERE asset_kind_id = A.asset_kind_id) as asset_kind_name , asset.name as asset_name , ( SELECT NAME FROM tb_area WHERE area_id = asset.area_id ) as area_name , TO_CHAR(A.reg_date::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_day , TO_CHAR(A.reg_date::timestamp, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_time , A.view_flag , zo.name as zone_name , A.reg_date AS reg FROM tb_alarm A LEFT JOIN tb_asset asset ON A.asset_id = asset.asset_id LEFT JOIN tb_alarm_kind ak ON A.alarm_kind_id = ak.alarm_kind_id LEFT JOIN tb_zone zo ON asset.zone_id = zo.zone_id ) MG WHERE 1=1
limit #{rows}::int offset (#{page}::int - 1) * #{rows}::int

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT A.alarm_uid , asset.zone_id , A.asset_id , A.asset_kind_id , A.alarm_kind_id , TO_CHAR(A.reg_date::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date , A.description , ak.risk_level , (SELECT NAME FROM tb_asset_kind WHERE asset_kind_id = A.asset_kind_id) as asset_kind_name , asset.name as asset_name
, ( SELECT NAME FROM tb_area WHERE area_id = asset.area_id ) as area_name , TO_CHAR(A.reg_date::timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_day , TO_CHAR(A.reg_date::timestamp, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS reg_time , A.view_flag , zo.name as zone_name FROM tb_alarm A LEFT JOIN tb_asset asset ON A.asset_id = asset.asset_id LEFT JOIN tb_alarm_kind ak ON A.alarm_kind_id = ak.alarm_kind_id LEFT JOIN tb_zone zo ON asset.zone_id = zo.zone_id ) MG WHERE 1=1

SELECT tad.sens_no, tad.meas_dt, tsi.sens_nm, tdi.district_nm, tad.sens_chnl_id, tad.alarm_lvl_cd, tad.formul_data, tad.net_err_yn, tad.maint_sts_cd, tai."1st_lvl_max" AS max1, tai."1st_lvl_min" AS min1, tai."2nd_lvl_max" AS max2, tai."2nd_lvl_min" AS min2, tai."3rd_lvl_max" AS max3, tai."3rd_lvl_min" AS min3, tai."4th_lvl_max" AS max4, tai."4th_lvl_min" AS min4, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_sms_details WHERE alarm_mgnt_no = tad.mgnt_no) AS sms_cnt FROM tb_alarm_details tad LEFT JOIN tb_district_info tdi ON tad.district_no = tdi.district_no LEFT JOIN tb_sensor_info tsi ON tad.sens_no = tsi.sens_no LEFT JOIN tb_alarm_info tai ON tad.sens_no = tai.sens_no WHERE 1=1 and alarm_lvl_cd = #{alarmLevel} and tad.reg_dt::timestamp > now() - interval '1 minutes';
